title: Center for International Stabilization and Recovery (CISR) Fellowships 2013-2014
description: A career development opportunity sponsored by the U.S. Department of State's Office of Weapons Removal and Abatement (PM/WRA) and administered by the Center for International Stabilization and Recovery (CISR) at James Madison University. The fellows serve in PM/WRAs Washington, D.C. office and gain valuable experience in managing international security and humanitarian assistance-related programs.
